item.title: After second Minneapolis shooting, Congress hurtles toward a partial government shutdown over DHS funding

item.title: Gov. Walz calls on Trump to halt ICE operations in Minnesota after another fatal shooting
item.description: "Minnesota has had it. This is sickening. The President must end this operation. Pull the thousands of violent, untrained officers out of Minnesota," ...

item.title: Trump threatens to impose 100% tariff if Canada makes deal with China
item.description: In his Truth Social post, Trump suggested that China would try to use Canada to try to avoid paying U.S. tariffs.

item.title: Trump withdraws 'Board of Peace' invitation to Carney in widening rift with Canada
item.description: Trump said he has withdrawn the invitation to Canada to join the new Board of Peace, days after Carney warned against economic coercion by superpowers...

item.title: House passes final funding bills 8 days before shutdown, Senate now will consider
item.description: The Senate will still have to pass the measures when it returns to Washington next week.
